body: When I go online and look at my statistics only some of it loads and the pie chart saying what games I've been on and all of that don't load I've waited half an hour and it still doesn't work and everyone else's i look at works help please :)
body_tagged: When I go online and look at my statistics only some of it loads and the pie chart saying what games I've been on and all of that don't load I've waited half an hour and it still doesn't work and everyone else's i look at works help please :)
title: Having a problem!

replies.body: Its a glitch. :c use http://avicus.net/385742/stats to view some of your stats.
replies.body_tagged: Its a glitch. :c use http://avicus.net/385742/stats to view some of your stats.

replies.body:
If you mean your forum profile stats the reason is that there is some glitch. 
This has happened to people who have joined during the few past months.
replies.body_tagged:
